articles.author: Eline Schaart
articles.title: Netherlands, Denmark confirm US has approved sending Ukraine F-16 jets - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Leaders of international coalition say it is still unclear when any transfer of jets could take place.
articles.content:
The Netherlands and Denmark confirmed Friday they received approval from the U.S. to hand over F-16 fighter jets to Ukraine as soon as pilot training is complete. 
Ministers from both countries, the… [+1865 chars]
